name: Toymatic
description:
3D Tetris. Move the claw of the crane machine,  rotate еру toys and place as many of them as you can inside.

You have 15 seconds to place the toy or it will drop by itself.

You can change the toy by clicking on the icon in right bottom corner.

Toys only give you points if they are above the active scale division.  

Active division is yellow. It activates after the first toy reaches it. 

The game ends when you reach the max capacity of the machine.
